document_data.name: Damlath
document_data.Personality: Damlath had an acerbic personality to which few warmed. He would usually only prepare very few combat spells, preferring spells that were investigative or concealing.
document_data.Possessions: Damlath acquired a [[flying carpet]] from [[Llorbauth]] and used it as a mount, in preference to a [[horse]]. He wore a cloak with magical pockets that could store extra equipment, such as his carpet.
document_data.Background:
Damlath was originally from [[Erlkazar]], and became a devotee of [[Oghma]] in [[Llorbauth]] at the [[Lore Halls]]. In 1350 DR, he went to [[Silverymoon]] to work with [[Sandrew|Sandrew the Wise]], and when Sandrew began work on the [[Font of Knowledge]] in [[Waterdeep]], Damlath helped in the construction.

In 1371 DR, Damlath began working with [[Raegar Stoneblade]], under [[Phanar Manthar]] at the Font of Knowledge in Waterdeep, with the aim of disclosing secrets held by wizards in the city. Together their surveillance and dispatching of [[Surkhas]] of [[Leilon]] was able to prevent the [[Arcane Brotherhood]] from claiming the High House of [[Thalivar]] and its secrets.

Damlath visited Erlkazar in Mirtul, 1374 DR.

Damlath was killed by the lich [[Priamon "Frostrune" Rakesk]], who used Damlath's body as a disguise.
